Package ruman.semestral_work.journal

Class FileTree

java.lang.Object
ruman.semestral_work.journal.FileTree
public class FileTree
extends java.lang.Object
Class to represent journal structure.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileTree

      public FileTree​(java.lang.String name, java.nio.file.Path path, ElementType type)
      Initialize (sub)tree with its name, path relative to journal root directory and type (file / directory)
      Parameters:
      name - name associated with tree / root node (name of file / directory)
      path - path to corresponding file / directory relative to journal root directory
      type - whether the root node represents a note (file) or group (directory)

  • Method Details

    • addRecursively

      public void addRecursively​(java.nio.file.Path path, java.nio.file.Path cut_off, ElementType type)
      Based on the structure of path add a new node somewhere in the tree (create whole branch or subbranch if needed).
      Parameters:
      path - path relative to this particular tree, describes where the new subtree belongs
      cut_off - path relative to the journal root directory, points to a parent of this tree
      type - what is the type of the new subtree

    • save

      public void save​(AppState app_state) throws java.io.IOException
      Save a file / directory to filesystem, path path, corresponding to the root of this tree.
      Parameters:
      app_state - instance of AppState that holds configuration
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • delete

      public void delete​(AppState app_state) throws java.io.IOException
      Delete file / directory corresponding to this whole tree (not only root node) on filesystem.
      Parameters:
      app_state - instance of AppState that holds configuration
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Name of directory or file (without extension).
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      name corresponding to the root of this tree

    • toStringDebug

      public java.lang.String toStringDebug()
      A more detailed version of toString() for debugging purposes.
      Returns:
      String representation of whole tree

    • rename

      public void rename​(java.lang.String new_name, AppState app_state) throws java.io.IOException
      Change the name associated with this tree (its root node) and write changes to filesystem.
      Parameters:
      new_name - new name of tree
      app_state - instance of AppState that holds configuration
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • propagateNameChange

      public void propagateNameChange​(java.nio.file.Path new_parent_path)
      Change paths of all subtrees to reflect the change in name of this tree.
      Parameters:
      new_parent_path - path to parent tree with changes applied
